entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
